author: BBC News
title: BBC Ukrainian journalist shown bombed family home
description: BBC Ukrainian's Olga Malchevska finds out her family home in Kyiv has been devastated.
content:
During an interview on BBC News, a BBC Ukrainian journalist viewed pictures of her family home, which was devastated overnight in Kyiv.
"This building is my home," Olga Malchevska told presenter Karâ€¦ [+188 chars]
